page.title: 04Fire Service in Clun Area
page.content: There are 11 firemen in Clun and none of them are fulltime workers. The engine is a Ford diesel and it will hold 6 crewmen. It was installed in the year 1979.The water tank will hold 1800 litres. The diesel engine powers the pump at the back of the vehicle. The main clothes worn by a fireman are boots,leggings, fire tunic, helmet and gloves. The fire service has been in Clun since the middle of the second world war. Firemen know when to go to the fire station because of their alerters. The alerters are small black boxes which emit a sound when a bleeper is activated. The fire men must rush to the fire station as soon as possible.
